title: India needs more capacity in future to meet rising power demand: Power Minister RK Singh
description: “We have successfully met 241 GW peak capacity, but we are on the edge. If the demand keeps increasing, then we will not be able to meet [the rising peak demand]. And, it is increasing,” Singh said while addressing the state power ministers’ meeting in the capital.
